data.value:
SOFTWARE LICENSE AGREEMENT
IMPORTANT: PLEASE READ THIS SOFTWARE LICENSE AGREEMENT CAREFULLY BEFORE USING THE SOFTWARE. This Software License Agreement (the "Agreement") is entered into between Transfopower (Pvt) Limited ("Licensor") and the end user ("Licensee") for the software product developed by Muhammad Faique ("Developer").
1- LICENSE GRANT Licensor hereby grants Licensee a non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the software product, including any accompanying documentation (collectively referred to as the "Software"), developed by Developer, strictly in accordance with the terms and conditions of this Agreement.
2- PERMITTED USES Licensee is authorized to use the Software for the purpose of manually checking communication with a meter. The Software is provided solely for Licensee's internal use and shall not be used for any other purposes without prior written consent from Licensor.
3- RESTRICTIONS Licensee may not: · Modify, adapt, or create derivative works of the Software. · Reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble the Software. · Remove or alter any proprietary notices or labels on the Software. · Rent, lease, or lend the Software to any third party.
4- INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS The Software and all intellectual property rights therein are owned by Licensor and/or Developer and are protected by applicable intellectual property laws and treaties. Licensee acknowledges that no title to the intellectual property rights in the Software is transferred to Licensee under this Agreement.
5- WARRANTY DISCLAIMER The Software is provided "as is" without warranty of any kind. Licensor and Developer disclaim all warranties, whether express, implied, or statutory, including but not limited to any warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.
6- LIMITATION OF LIABILITY Licensor and Developer shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or relating to the use or inability to use the Software, even if advised of the possibility of such damages. In no event shall Licensor's or Developer's total liability exceed the amount paid by Licensee for the Software.
7- TERMINATION This license is effective until terminated. Licensor or Licensee may terminate this license at any time without notice. Upon termination, Licensee must cease all use of the Software and destroy all copies in Licensee's possession.
8- GOVERNING LAW This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Pakistan. Any legal action or proceeding arising out of or relating to this Agreement shall be exclusively brought in the courts of Pakistan. By using the Software, Licensee acknowledges that Licensee has read and understood this Agreement and agrees to be bound by its terms and conditions.
